title: Object - Equity Compensation Transfer Transaction
description: Object describing a transfer of equity compensation

object_type.description: This is done to avoid a breaking change as we work towards a bigger restructure of the equity types in v2.0.0. `TX_PLAN_SECURITY_TRANSFER` will be deprecated in v2.0.0
object_type.title: Enum - Object Type

quantity.description: Quantity of non-monetary security units transferred
quantity.title: Type - Numeric

comments.description: Unstructured text comments related to and stored for the object

security_id.description: Identifier for the security (stock, plan security, warrant, or convertible) by which it can be referenced by other transaction objects. Note that while this identifier is created with an issuance object, it should be different than the issuance object's `id` field which identifies the issuance transaction object itself. All future transactions on the security (e.g. acceptance, transfer, cancel, etc.) must reference this `security_id` to qualify which security the transaction applies to.

date.description: Date on which the transaction occurred
date.title: Type - Date

consideration_text.description: Unstructured text description of consideration provided in exchange for security transfer

balance_security_id.description: Identifier for the security that holds the remainder balance (for partial transfers)

resulting_security_ids.title: Security Transfer - Resulting Security ID Array
resulting_security_ids.description: Array of identifiers for new security (or securities) created as a result of the transaction
